headline: U.S. Bank launches AI-driven cash forecasting tool
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, November 18, 2025--U.S. Bank today introduced a cash forecasting tool with Kyriba to help businesses gain real-time visibility and control over their cash and liquidity positions. U.S. Bank Liquidity Manager, powered by Kyriba’s liquidity performance platform, leverages traditional methods and advanced AI to deliver cash forecasting, scenario planning, and operational efficiency for both mid-sized and large firms.
